author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3738: DataInput/DataOutput no longer allow negative vLongs. vInts are still supported (for index backwards compatibility), but should not be used in new code. The read method for negative vLongs was already broken since Lucene 3.1

author: jboynes
msg: rename trunk level license files and remove from modules
